title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.3 - Foreign institutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.3 - Foreign institutions

State Regulations

Institutions in foreign countries maintaining standards not
lower than institutions of the same grade and character in this State may be
considered by the commissioner as registered institutions for the acceptance of
courses of study completed therein toward departmental credentials or toward
admission to departmental examinations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

13.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
